articles.title: Greetings to Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian President
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Hassan Rouhani, president of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on the occasion of the Iranian New Year.
					 Kim in his message sincerely hoped that the president and people of Iran would register bigger success in their work for defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and achieving its economic development and wished him good health and happiness in the new year.

articles.title: Greetings to Iranian First Vice-President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian First Vice-President
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Friday sent a message of greeting to Eshaq Jahangiri, first vice-president of Iran, on the occasion of the Iranian New Year.
					 The message wished the first vice-president and government of Iran bigger success in their work for the country's independent development.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger, it wished the friendly Iranian people well-being and prosperity.
					
					 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Iranian counterpart Mohammad Javad Zarif.

articles.title: President of Tatarstan and His Party Arrive
articles.content:
President of Tatarstan and His Party Arrive
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation, and his party arrived here on Friday to mark the 65th anniversary of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation. 
					 They were greeted at the airport by Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned, Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK Minister of Foreign Trade and President of Tatarstan Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK Minister of Foreign Trade and President of Tatarstan Held
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade of the DPRK, and Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation, were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Kim Chang Ho, vice-president of the Academy of Agricultural Science, and officials concerned and from the opposite side were the party of the president, Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 The talks discussed the issues of developing the trade and economic cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 Talks involving different sectors on cooperation in various fields including oil industry, construction and agriculture took place between both sides at the People's Palace of Culture on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK, Tatarstan Sign Agreement on Cooperation
articles.content:
DPRK, Tatarstan Sign Agreement on Cooperation 
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- An agreement on cooperation between the Chamber of Commerce of the DPRK and the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation was signed here Friday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned and from the opposite side Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan, and his party and Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Government Gives Banquet in Honor of President of Tatarstan and His Party
articles.content:
DPRK Government Gives Banquet in Honor of President of Tatarstan and His Party
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government Friday gave a banquet in honor of the president of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation and his party.
					 Present there on invitation were Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan, and his party, Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Vice-Premier Kang Sok Ju, Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Vice-Foreign Minister Kung Sok Ung and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Kang Sok Ju and Rustam Minnikhanov made speeches at the banquet.

articles.title: President of Tatarstan Lays Wreath before Liberation Tower
articles.content:
President of Tatarstan Lays Wreath before Liberation Tower
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan, and his party laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower Friday.
					 Present there were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned, Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants laid a wreath in the name of the president and observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 Then, they looked round the tower.

articles.title: President of Tatarstan and His Party Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
President of Tatarstan and His Party Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation, and his party Friday visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					 They laid bouquets before the sculpture "Victory", the monument to the victory in the war, and paid high tribute to the officers and men of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 They went round several halls, being briefed on the ardent patriotism and heroic fighting spirit of the army and people displayed in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 After the visit the president made an entry in the visitor's book.
					
					 On the same day, they went to the Taedonggang Tile Factory and others.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Flies Back
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Flies Back 
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Wu Dawei, special envoy of the Chinese government for the affairs of the Korean peninsula, and his party left here by air Friday.

articles.title: Lao Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Lao Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Friday on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP).
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee who double as chairman of the DPRK-Lao Friendship Association, Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kiettisak Keobanhdith in his speech said that the LPRP and the WPK had traditional friendly relations in which they supported and cooperated with each other.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and the two countries are further developing in depth in all fields under the deep care of the top leaders of the two parties, he noted.
					
					 Kim Yong Il said that the party and people of Laos have made many successes in their efforts to implement the tasks and attain goals set forth in the 9th congress of the party under the banner of patriotism, independence and self-reliance and strenuous efforts.
					
					 He evinced the pledge to make positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the LPRP in the future, too, true to the noble intention of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Senior Secondary School Renamed after Hero Kim Kum Su
articles.content:
Senior Secondary School Renamed after Hero Kim Kum Su
 Usi, March 21 (KCNA) -- Palun Senior Secondary School was renamed after Kim Kum Su, hero of the DPRK, and his bust was erected at the school in Usi County, Jagang Province.
					 Kim Kum Su, a graduate from the then Palun Middle School, joined the Korean People's Army. After finishing his military service, he worked at an explosive defusing squad of the Kangwon Provincial People's Security Bureau. He contributed to detecting and defusing lots of explosives, protecting the lives and properties of people.
					
					 In October two years ago he died heroic death after saving his comrades at the critical moment of defusing a time bomb dropped by a U.S. forces plane during the Korean war.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un praised him as the best man trained by the party, a model of security personnel in the Songun era and a genuine party cell secretary desired by the party.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made sure that he enjoyed an eternal life and his alma mater was renamed after the hero and his bust was erected at the school.
					
					 The renaming ceremony took place on Friday.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round the bust.

articles.title: Dissemination of Science and Technology Brisk at Three-Revolution Exhibition House
articles.content:
Dissemination of Science and Technology Brisk at Three-Revolution Exhibition House 
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Science and technology are being briskly disseminated at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House.
					 The house has rooms for the dissemination of science and technology in inter-sector exhibition halls.
					
					 3-D scientific and educational films and other multi-media that are shown at the dissemination room of the electronics industry exhibition hall are highly appreciated by the visitors.
					
					 A variety of data including scientific films help visitors have deep understanding of the world of science at the dissemination room of heavy industry and agriculture exhibition halls.
					
					 There are brisk exchanges of the latest scientific and intellectual products occasioned by scientific and technological festivals, national and international exhibitions and expositions at the exhibition hall introducing new technological innovations. The service of data that obtained patent at home and abroad helps officials, youth, students and working people acquire much more scientific and technological knowledge.
					
					 The house is also using network to widely disseminate modern scientific and technological data.

articles.title: New Lyrics Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
New Lyrics Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Poets in the DPRK went into the stirring realities to write new lyrics high in the ideological value and artistry.
					 The Mansudae Art Troupe set to music the lyrics "People's Country" which truthfully represents the genuine people's country where all dreams and ideals come true thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the new lyrics are "A single mind of people", " People follow you Marshal", "Only you in this world", "We go the way shown by Marshal" that impressively depict the people's ardent longing for Kim Jong Un and their best wishes for his good health.
					
					 Lyrics "Our land and sky under bright sunshine" deals with the honor and pride of the people being blessed with the illustrious leaders and judicious party generation after generation.
					
					 The new lyrics including "Water park associated with love" and "May my ski run" vividly represent with truthful poetic words the happy people enjoying at the public service centers built under the warm care of the party.
					
					 "Path of faith" successfully deals with the revolutionary spirit of the army and people in the DPRK advancing confidently along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Popular Policies
articles.content:
DPRK's Popular Policies
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Korean people lead a truly happy life in their socialist motherland thanks to the popular policies pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 The Agrarian Reform Law, the Labor Law, the Law on Sex Equality, the Law on Nationalization of Major Industries and others were promulgated in Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 The laws provided rights to a worthwhile life and the working and living conditions to the people who turned out to build new democratic Korea.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War the universal free medical service was established, a state measure was taken for ensuring the working people's rest at sanatoria and holiday homes and there appeared a rest home for service personnel of the People's Army on the frontline.
					
					 Measures were taken to eliminate the agricultural tax in kind between 1964 and 1966.
					
					 The Korean people receive free medical service at the state expense.
					
					 The universal compulsory primary education was introduced from 1956, the universal compulsory secondary education from 1958 and the universal compulsory eleven-year education was fully enforced across the country from September 1, 1975. 
					
					 "The Law on the Nursing and Upbringing of Children of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" was adopted in 1976 and "Theses on Socialist Education" made public in 1977.
					
					 The law "On abolishing the tax system" was promulgated at the Third Session of the Fifth Supreme People's Assembly on March 21, 1974.
					
					 The Socialist Labor Law, the unique labor charter, was enacted and promulgated amid the steady improvement of the socialist labor policy year after year.
					
					 The state benefits are given through the national social insurance programs and the social security system.
					
					  The law on the universal compulsory 12-year education system was promulgated at the Sixth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly held in 2012.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Establishing Cultured Practices in Production and Life in Spring Season
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Establishing Cultured Practices in Production and Life in Spring Season
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- March and April are hygienic months in the DPRK every year.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial calls for raising a strong wind of establishing cultured practices in production and life during the hygienic months.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is an important issue to thoroughly establish cultured practices in production and life under socialism.
					
					 To establish cultured practices in production and life and dress oneself well and keep oneself in proper shape are not a simple issue for form's sake but important criteria showing one's spiritual and moral qualities.
					
					 Those who make a revolution should be neatly dressed and keep their environment neat and tidy to lead a beautiful and highly civilized life.
					
					 The goal set by the party to build a highly civilized country under socialism is grandiose and bright. Therefore, it is necessary to assert steady high demands in our life and struggle to attain the goal and put it into practice by our efforts.
					
					 It is necessary to demonstrate the spirit of the Korean nation not only in the drive for the building of an economic power but in the construction of a highly civilized country under socialism by bringing into full bloom Korean-style advantageous and noble Songun culture.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Deepening Study of Works of Peerlessly Great Men
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Deepening Study of Works of Peerlessly Great Men 
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The immortal works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the documents of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), a library of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, serve as the most precious textbooks for all party members and other working people to study and valuable ideological and moral wealth.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article:
					
					 The works comprehensively clarify the essence and principles of Juche idea and Songun idea, guidelines of the WPK, and ways to implement them.
					
					 They also lucidly explain the theoretical and practical issues arising in all spheres including politics, military, economy and culture.
					
					 If one deepens the study of the works, one can deeply grasp the originality, advantages, validity and tremendous vitality of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and one will deem it great honor to have a great guiding idea in the era of independence. 
					
					 That is why the WPK has always directed great efforts to the study of the works and is making a breakthrough in the on-going ideological offensive by intensifying the habit of study to firmly grasp the immortal works and the documents of the party.
					
					 The article calls on all party members and other working people to deepen the study of the works and documents of the party in order to cherish the revolutionary ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as a steadfast revolutionary outlook on the world and fully prepare themselves as genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists who live and work as required by them in any place and at any time.

articles.title: Destiny of Nation Should Be Protected by Its Own Efforts: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Destiny of Nation Should Be Protected by Its Own Efforts: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article says that the destiny of the nation should be protected by its own efforts.
					 It goes on:
					
					 For all fellow countrymen to take a Juche-oriented stand of the nation is an essential requirement for smashing the unprecedentedly reckless war moves of foreign forces and defending peace and security of the country and nation.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad are responsible for foiling the U.S. reckless moves for a war against the DPRK and defending peace and security of the country and nation.
					
					 Only when all compatriots turn out in the struggle, united close with a single desire and purpose, their strength will be inexhaustible and they can surely meet outsiders' blatant and aggressive challenge.
					
					 Dependence on the foreign forces, who do not wish to see the improved inter-Korean relations, and cooperation with them would make it hard to mend those relations.
					
					 To infringe upon the interests of the whole nation by following outsiders in quest of narrow-minded partisan interests would amount to an unpardonable act of treachery.
					
					 If the north and the south pool their will and efforts from the steadfast Juche-oriented stand of the nation, they can certainly foil the foreign forces' moves to rein and interfere in the issues of the nation.
					
					 The north and the south have a good experience in paving the way for improving their relations, protecting the interests common to the nation and promoting the confidence and unity from the stand of By Korean nation itself after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The fellow countrymen are the best and there is nothing impossible for them if they pool their efforts.

articles.title: Lifting of "May 24 Step" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lifting of "May 24 Step" Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- South Korean experts on the situation called for the lifting of "May 24 step", a confrontational measure, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 This was clarified by the Institute for Modern Economic Studies of south Korea on March 18.
					
					 88 experts on issues of reunification, diplomacy and security were polled by the institute over what is a top priority task for building confidence between the north and the south recently and 46.6 percent of the respondents said it was to lift the "May 24 step".
					
					 79.5 percent of the respondents, in particular, underscored the need to expand dialogue and cooperation in an effort to improve the north-south relations and achieve the reunification of the country and 61.4 percent of them noted that the tour of Mt. Kumgang is a symbol of reconciliation and peace between the north and the south.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Urge Japan's Apology and Reparation
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Urge Japan's Apology and Reparation 
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Twelve universities of south Korea including Korea University separately held demonstrations on March 19 denouncing the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to Voice of People, internet newspaper of south Korea.
					 The participants accused Japan of its impudent remarks that "comfort women existed in any country at war."
					
					 They held that the Japanese government should admit its past crimes and make formal apology and legal reparation.
					
					 The south Korean "government" should also actively opt for helping the victims win back the honor and rights trampled down by the Imperial Japanese Army, they charged.

articles.title: 25th General Meeting of Central Members of U.S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Held
articles.content:
25th General Meeting of Central Members of U.S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Held 
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) held the 25th general meeting of its central members in Los Angeles on March 16. 
					 Chairman of the Headquarters Paek Sung Bae made a speech. 
					
					 He called upon Koreans in the U.S. to actively turn out in the struggle to bring about the day of reunification when Koreans will live together. 
					
					 The general meeting heard a report on last year's activities and discussed the issues to conduct a more dynamic movement for reunification this year.

articles.title: Rosy Future Is in Store for Korean Nation: Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
Rosy Future Is in Store for Korean Nation: Korean in U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Jong Ki Ryol, editor-in-chief of the Chinese internet paper 4th Media News who is a Korean in the United States, expressed his great excitement at the news that supreme leader Kim Jong Un was elected a deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK.
					 His election as a deputy to the SPA was the manifestation of unanimous support and ardent desire of all Korean people, he noted and went on:
					
					 The recent election of deputies to the SPA strikingly demonstrated the revolutionary mettle of the Korean people to carry forward the socialist cause without the slightest vacillation and an inch of deflection by dint of the might of the single-minded unity around Kim Jong Un, the unitary center.
					
					 It also reflected their desire to glorify generation after generation the great history and tradition of the DPRK adorned with victory, glory and miracles and continue to make rapid progress towards the world standard true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Saying that a brighter and rosier future is in store for the Korean nation as it is led by Kim Jong Un, he expressed conviction that the socialist system centered on the popular masses unprecedented in human history would shine more brilliantly and a rich and powerful reunified country would emerge before long thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Action Staged in Japan in Defence of Koreans' Right to National Education
articles.content:
Action Staged in Japan in Defence of Koreans' Right to National Education 
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting of students across Japan rejecting the discrimination against Korean schools took place in Tokyo on March 9.
					 It was attended by members of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, Koreans in Japan and Japanese students and citizens from different parts of the country.
					
					 The meeting heard a report on the activities conducted in different parts of Japan against the Japanese government's discrimination against the Korean schools.
					
					 It was followed by a drama staged by Korean students in Japan which clarified the essence of the policy of discriminating against the Korean schools and linked the April 24 struggle for education with the on-going struggle for the settlement of the issue of support to the Korean schools.
					
					 A declaration of Korean students in Japan was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The declaration called for intensifying the activities to defend the Korean schools and the right to national education.

articles.title: Japanese Asahi Shimbun Accused of Hurting Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Asahi Shimbun Accused of Hurting Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
 Tokyo, March 20 (KNS-KCNA) -- Representatives of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on March 18  lodged a strong protest with the Japanese Asahi Shimbun against carrying an article hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 That day they visited the head office of the Asahi Shimbun in Tokyo where they accused the paper of conducting a smear campaign seriously hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK by setting in motion human scum despite the repeated protests from the DPRK. 
					
					 The recent article is an unpardonable sheer fabrication pursuant to the anti-DPRK human rights racket kicked up by the U.S. and its allies, they charged, strongly demanding the newspaper immediately make an apology and correct the article.
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are becoming increasingly vocal in their protest and condemnation of the crimes committed by Japanese conservative media.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by Organization of DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The DR Congo－Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association released a statement on March 12 denouncing the ever-more undisguised U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. again kicked off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers against the DPRK together with south Korea despite the unanimous protest and denunciation of the world peace-loving people, pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war. In addition to this, the U.S. is stepping up the unprecedented moves to stifle the DPRK, talking about the nonexistent "human rights issue" there.
					
					 The U.S. is branding the just rocket launching drills conducted by the DPRK between February 21 and March 4 as a "provocation" and a "violation of the resolutions of the UN Security Council" while doing everything as it likes to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The above-said facts patently reveal the U.S. brigandish nature characterized by its shamelessness and brazen-facedness.
					
					 We scathingly condemn the aggressive and brangandish acts of the bellicose and arrogant Yankee imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. should drop its bad habit of deliberately blaming others and properly know the military muscle built by the DPRK with Songun.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should roll back the policy of toeing the U.S. line, advance along the road of reunification of Korea and stop at once the reckless joint military exercises with the U.S.
					
					 Brave service personnel and people of the DPRK, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un, are closely following the moves of the hostile forces to stifle the DPRK. If a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula, they will mercilessly punish the arrogant U.S. imperialist aggressors.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Korean in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Korean in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Jang Sun Jong, chairperson of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, expressed great emotion and joy at the news that supreme leader Kim Jong Un was elected a deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK.
					 Jang said:
					
					 The news that Kim Jong Un was elected a deputy to the SPA of the DPRK delighted Koreans in Russia. This is an expression of the absolute trust of all the people across the country in Kim Jong Un and an reflection of the firm faith and will of all the service personnel of the Korean People's Army and people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under his leadership.
					
					 As they are led by him, the dignity and spirit of the nation have been put on the highest level, the DPRK is making a leap forward with dynamism and a great surge is being brought about in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Seeing the DPRK firmly standing against the U.S., Koreans in Russia are admiring the grit, pluck and outstanding strategy of Kim Jong Un and are convinced that the country would be reunified before long.
					
					 The Koreans in Russia will in the future, too, firmly believe and follow only Kim Jong Un and make all efforts to bring earlier the day of national reunification under his leadership, just as they held and followed the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il invariably with one mind as the leaders of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Nepalese Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Nepalese Paper
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese paper Arpan carried a special write-up illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung on Mar. 7 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Its article titled "President Kim Il Sung, eternal sun of Juche" said:
					
					 The President was a great philosopher, statesman and strategist who adorned the 20th century with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and wise leadership.
					
					 He fathered the Juche idea centered on the masses, ushering in the Juche era, a new era in the history of mankind.
					
					 He also defeated the two formidable enemies, the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, in one generation and led the social revolution of various stages to victory.
					
					 The feats performed by him in all fields including politics, economy, military and culture are the precious legacy not only for the Korean people but for the world progressives.
					
					 He was the greatest man who dedicated himself to the country and its people and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence, regarding it as his motto to believe in people as in Heaven.
					
					 He will always be alive along with mankind.
					
					 He developed the Korean People's Army into a powerful revolutionary army of Juche, the army of the Party and leader and the genuine army for the people.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the President, the KPA defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and thus defended the sovereignty of the country and made a great contribution to ensuring world peace and security.
					
					 He was the eternal sun of the Korean nation as he dedicated himself to national reunification.

articles.title: Russians Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Russians Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- There took place before the U.S. consulate general in Vladivostok of Russia on Mar. 11 a demonstration against the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 It was participated in by figures of the maritime territory branch of All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" and masses.
					
					 The demonstrators accused the U.S. of hurling huge aggressor forces into the Korean peninsula and staging war drills, thus escalating tensions, and taking issue with the DPRK over its legitimate rocket-firing exercises.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Hassan Rouhani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Hassan Rouhani
						
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran, Hassan Rouhani, con motivo del Ano Nuevo del pais persico.
					 El remitente desea al destinatario buena salud y felicidad tambien en el Ano Nuevo, haciendo sinceros votos por mayores exitos en los trabajos de el y el pueblo irani para defender la soberania y la dignidad del pais y lograr el desarrollo economico.

articles.title: Conversan en Pyongyang Ri Ryong Nam y Rustam Minnikhanov
articles.content:
Conversan en Pyongyang Ri Ryong Nam y Rustam Minnikhanov
						
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 21 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre el ministro de Comercio Exterior de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Ryong Nam, y el presidente de la Republica de Tatarstan de la Federacion Rusa, Rustam Minnikhanov.
					En la ocasion participaron por la parte coreana el vicepresidente de la Academia de Ciencias Agricolas, Kim Chang Ho, y otros funcionarios coreanos y por la de Tatarstan, la comitiva del presidente, el embajador Alexandr Timonin y otros miembros de la embajada rusa en Corea.
					
					Se debatieron los problemas para desarrollar la cooperacion comercial y economica entre ambas partes.
					
					Por otra parte, tuvieron lugar el mismo dia en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo las conversaciones por sectores entre ambas partes sobre las cooperaciones en diversas ramas inclusive la industria petrolera, construccion, agricultura, etc.

articles.title: Rubricado acuerdo sobre la cooperacion entre Corea y Tatarstan
articles.content:
Rubricado acuerdo sobre la cooperacion entre Corea y Tatarstan
						
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedo firmado el dia 21 en esta capital el acuerdo sobre la cooperacion entre las Camaras de Comercio de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica de Tatarstan de la Federacion Rusa.
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el ministro de Comercio Exterior, Ri Ryong Nam, el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung y otros funcionarios y por la de Tatarstan, el presidente Rustam Minnikhanov y su comitiva, el embajador ruso Alexandr Timonin.

articles.title: Gobierno de RPDC ofrece banquete en honor de presidente de Tatarstan y su comitiva
articles.content:
Gobierno de RPDC ofrece banquete en honor de presidente de Tatarstan y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio hoy una recepcion en honor del presidente de la Republica de Tatarstan de la Federacion Rusa y su comitiva.
					Fueron invitados a la comida Rustam Minnikhanov, presidente de la Republica de Tatarstan de la Federacion Rusa y su comitiva, el embajador Alexandr Timonin y los miembros de la embajada rusa en Corea.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion el vicepremier Kang Sok Ju, el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					En la ocasion, Kang y el presidente Rustam Minnikhanov pronunciaron discursos.

articles.title: Embajador lao ofrece banquete por 59o aniversario del PPRL
articles.content:
Embajador lao ofrece banquete por 59o aniversario del PPRL
						
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 59o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, el embajador laosiano en Corea, Kiettisak Keobanhdith, ofrecio el dia 21 un banquete en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Il, la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, el presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Cha Hui Rim, quien es titular de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Laos, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Chang Gun, y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					Kiettisak Keobanhdith dijo en su discurso que el Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea tienen las relaciones tradicionales de amistad que apoyan y cooperan entre si.
					
					Enfatizo que bajo la profunda atencion de los maximos Dirigentes de dos partidos, las relaciones de amistad y de cooperacion consolidaran y desarrollaran mas profundamente.
					
					Le siguio en usar la palabra Kim Yong Il quien senalo que el partido y el pueblo de Laos logran muchos exitos en la lucha por cumplir y alcanzar las tareas y metas presentadas en el IX Congreso del Partido bajo la bandera de patriotismo, soberania, independencia y autoconfianza.
					
					Dijo que se esforzaran activamente por fortalecer en el futuro tambien las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el PPRL conforme al noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
